title: Matt Warman – 2021 Comments on Cyber Security Laws
author: admin
summary: The comments made by Matt Warman, the Digital Infrastructure Minister, on 21 April 2021.
content:
Our phones and smart devices can be a gold mine for hackers looking to steal data, yet a great number still run older software with holes in their security systems.
